title: Pepper: The King of Spices
description: Pepper: The King of Spices is an engaging introduction to the history of a very common table spice. Engaging illustrations and photographs support information on where and how pepper grows, the history of its value and uses, and how it was exported to all parts of the world.
meta: demand, explorers, flavor, grind, journey, peppercorn, spices, supply, trade
Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand the text
Main Idea and Details : Identify the main idea and supporting details
Similes : Recognize and understand the use of similes

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
